description:
Vice Admiral Ulanfu was the commander of the 10th Fleet.
Died when his ship, the http://anidb.net/ch82273 [Bang-goo], was blown up in battle with http://anidb.net/ch191 [Bittenfeld]`s Black Lancers near the planet Lugen, shortly before the decisive Battle of Amritsar Starzone. Encircled by the Lancers, he used his flagship as the rearguard in a breakout operation, managing to save about half of the 10th fleet.
name: Ulanfu
